They note that the language has come a long way in recent years, with properties like filter, mask-image, mix-blend-mode, additional gradient types like radial-gradient, and more, opening the door for Photoshop-like effects that werenâ€™t possibleÂ before.

With it, you can animate individual elements across different pages even when the browser does an entirely fresh pageÂ load. Support is limited and experimental for now, but as a bit of extra visual flair, it may be possible to justify its short-termÂ use.
